# Parent Guidebook · Eyecare (eyecare.parentguidebook.org)

> Free, evidence-based children's eye health guide for parents. Bilingual (English and Chinese). Not medical advice.

Educational content from published research and international guidelines. Topics: leukocoria (white pupil), strabismus, amblyopia, myopia, vision screening, eye exam schedules. For parents and caregivers worldwide.

## Main pages

- [Home (English)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/): Landing and article index
- [Home (Chinese)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/): 首页与文章索引
- [About (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/about/): How we create content
- [About (ZH)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/about/): 关于我们
- [Sources (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/sources/): Full source list
- [Sources (ZH)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/sources/): 参考来源

## Emergency signs (when to act quickly)

- [White pupil / leukocoria (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/emergency-signs/white-pupil/)
- [White pupil / 白瞳 (ZH)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/emergency-signs/white-pupil/)
- [Misaligned eyes / strabismus (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/emergency-signs/misaligned-eyes/)
- [Misaligned eyes / 斜视 (ZH)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/emergency-signs/misaligned-eyes/)
- [Signs of vision problems (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/emergency-signs/signs-of-vision-problems/)
- [Signs of vision problems (ZH)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/emergency-signs/signs-of-vision-problems/)

- [Newborn eyes, first year (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/guides/newborn-eyes/) · [ZH](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/guides/newborn-eyes/)
- [Toddler & preschool (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/guides/toddler-preschool/) · [ZH](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/guides/toddler-preschool/)
- [School-age eye health (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/guides/school-age/) · [ZH](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/guides/school-age/)

## Eye exams

- [When to get screened / schedule (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/eye-exams/schedule/) · [ZH](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/eye-exams/schedule/)
- [What happens at an eye exam (EN)](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/en/eye-exams/what-happens/) · [ZH](https://eyecare.parentguidebook.org/zh/eye-exams/what-happens/)
